languages.text: {n}Абеляр грозно сводит брови и отчеканивает своим самым "офицерским" голосом:{/n} "По желанию главы династии фон Валанциус, полноправного {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, владеюще{mf|го|й} правом власти на Футфоле — вы, отребье, приговариваетесь к смерти! Да смилостивится {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} над вашими душами — ибо мы милости не явим".

{n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр грозно сводит брови и отчеканивает своим самым "офицерским" голосом:{/n} "По желанию главы династии фон Валанциус, полноправного {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}, владеюще{mf|го|й} правом власти на Футфоле — вы, отребье, приговариваетесь к смерти! Да смилостивится {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} над вашими душами — ибо мы милости не явим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "In accordance with the wishes of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, the fully entitled Rogue Trader with the right of power on Footfall, you, riffraff, are hereby sentenced to death! May the Emperor have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

{n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "In accordance with the wishes of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, the fully entitled Rogue Trader with the right of power on Footfall, you, riffraff, are hereby sentenced to death! May the Emperor have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

{n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised Rogue Trader with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the Emperor have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

{n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised Rogue Trader with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the Emperor have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

{n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德充满恶意地瞪着眼睛，尽可能地以符合军官身份的平静语气开了口。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领袖，获得完全认可的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，拥有所有附带的权利与特权，包括对落脚港的权利。根据行商浪人的命令，你们这群人渣将在此被判处死刑！愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}怜悯你们的灵魂，因为我们绝不会有任何怜悯。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德充满恶意地瞪着眼睛，尽可能地以符合军官身份的平静语气开了口。{/n}“冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领袖，获得完全认可的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，拥有所有附带的权利与特权，包括对落脚港的权利。根据行商浪人的命令，你们这群人渣将在此被判处死刑！愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}怜悯你们的灵魂，因为我们绝不会有任何怜悯。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard le mira, amenazador, y con su mejor voz de «oficial», declara:{/n} «Por orden de{mf|l| la} actual cabeza de la dinastía von Valancius, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de pleno derecho con todos los privilegios y derechos correspondientes incluyendo autoridad sobre Paso, ¡quedáis condenados a muerte, escoria! Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} se apiade de vuestras almas, porque nosotros no lo haremos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard le mira, amenazador, y con su mejor voz de «oficial», declara:{/n} «Por orden de{mf|l| la} actual cabeza de la dinastía von Valancius, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de pleno derecho con todos los privilegios y derechos correspondientes incluyendo autoridad sobre Paso, ¡quedáis condenados a muerte, escoria! Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} se apiade de vuestras almas, porque nosotros no lo haremos».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドが鋭い目つきで、これでもかと『将校』の声色で言葉を放つ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の君主、フットフォールの権限並びに、伴う権利と特権を持つ何より認められた{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の命の下、ここで貴様ら無法者に死刑を宣告する！こちらは一切容赦しない。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が貴様らの魂に慈悲をかけてくださることを祈れ」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドが鋭い目つきで、これでもかと『将校』の声色で言葉を放つ。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の君主、フットフォールの権限並びに、伴う権利と特権を持つ何より認められた{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の命の下、ここで貴様ら無法者に死刑を宣告する！こちらは一切容赦しない。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}が貴様らの魂に慈悲をかけてくださることを祈れ」

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt finster und bedrohlich drein und sagt in seiner besten "Offizier"-Stimme:{/n} "Auf Befehl {mf|des Anführers|der Anführerin} der Dynastie von Valancius, ausgestattet mit allen Rechten und Privilegien der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}, einschließlich der unbedingten Autorität auf Footfall, seid Ihr Gesindel hiermit zum Tode verurteilt! Möge der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Euren Seelen gnädig sein, denn von uns könnt Ihr das nicht erwarten."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard blickt finster und bedrohlich drein und sagt in seiner besten "Offizier"-Stimme:{/n} "Auf Befehl {mf|des Anführers|der Anführerin} der Dynastie von Valancius, ausgestattet mit allen Rechten und Privilegien der {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändler{/g}, einschließlich der unbedingten Autorität auf Footfall, seid Ihr Gesindel hiermit zum Tode verurteilt! Möge der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} Euren Seelen gnädig sein, denn von uns könnt Ihr das nicht erwarten."

languages.text: {n}Avec un regard noir et menaçant, Abélard déclare de sa meilleure voix de stentor :{/n} « Sur ordre {mf|du dirigeant|de la dirigeante} de la dynastie von Valancius, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand reconnu|libre-marchande reconnue}{/g} et disposant de tous les droits et privilèges associés, parmi lesquels l'autorité pleine et entière sur Castel, vous êtes condamné à mort, racaille ! Puisse l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} avoir pitié de votre âme, car nous n'en aurons aucune. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un regard noir et menaçant, Abélard déclare de sa meilleure voix de stentor :{/n} « Sur ordre {mf|du dirigeant|de la dirigeante} de la dynastie von Valancius, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand reconnu|libre-marchande reconnue}{/g} et disposant de tous les droits et privilèges associés, parmi lesquels l'autorité pleine et entière sur Castel, vous êtes condamné à mort, racaille ! Puisse l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} avoir pitié de votre âme, car nous n'en aurons aucune. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, tehdit saçan dik bakışlarını ve en sert "subay" sesini takınıp konuşuyor.{/n} "Von Valancius hanedanlığının önderi, Binliman üzerinde otorite sahibi olmak da dâhil her türlü hak ve ayrıcalıklarla donatılmış tam yetkili bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olarak bu ayaktakımını ölüm cezasına çarptırmıştır! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} ruhlarınıza merhamet etsin zira biz etmeyeceğiz."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glowers menacingly and says in his best "officer" voice,{/n} "By the order of the head of the von Valancius dynasty, a fully recognised {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} with all the attendant rights and privileges, including authority on Footfall, you riffraff are hereby sentenced to death! May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} have mercy on your souls, for we will show none."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, tehditkâr bakışlarını ve en sert "subay" sesini takınıp şöyle diyor:{/n} "Von Valancius hanedanının önderi; Binliman'da yetki sahibi olmak da üzere tüm hak ve ayrıcalıklara sahip tam teşekküllü bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olarak siz ayaktakımını ölüm cezasına çarptırdı! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} ruhlarınıza merhamet etsin zira biz etmeyeceğiz."
